notes: Implemented QoS rule CRUD endpoints (GET/POST /qos/rules, PUT/DELETE /qos/rules/:id)
QoS config schema: enabled, algorithm (fq_codel/cake/htb), wan_upload_kbps, wan_download_kbps
QoS rule schema: name, source_ip, protocol, priority (0-7), bandwidth_limit, enabled
All endpoints follow Chanfana patterns with OpenAPI 3.1 schemas
Rules support filtering by name, source_ip, protocol with default ordering by priority
